ability0.desc: Speed up the target's block drop speed by amplifying the flow of time for 15 seconds.
ability0.title: Temporal Rift

ability1.desc: By applying a massive amount of gravity you cause the target's block to immediately drop.
ability1.title: Gravity Charge

ability2.desc: Confuse the target by distorting the space around them, reversing their controls for 15 seconds.
ability2.title: Spatial Distortion

ability3.desc: By rending spacetime asunder you stop the target's time and freeze its controls solid for 10 seconds.
ability3.title: Spacetime Rupture

sorcerer.desc: A powerful magician harnessing the power of space and time to defeat his foes.
sorcerer.title: The Sorcerer

classes.speed-tooltip: Speed - every X ms moves the block down

ability0.desc: Uses a simple shovel, that he found under a bridge, to remove a row at the bottom a Battlefield.
ability0.title: Shovel

ability1.desc: In infinite boredom, the Unknown has optimized his skills with the Slingshot to shoot a whole series of stones at the bottom of a Battlefield.
ability1.title: Slingshot

ability2.desc: The unknown has spent his time with a spinning top. The fast spins confuse opponents and they will spin their stones endless.
ability2.title: Spinning Top

ability3.desc: The unknown is just so damn friendly and invites his target for a drink.
ability3.title: The Drink

unknown.desc: A traveller from a distant land, looking for his destination. Has general abilities without a special orientation.
unknown.title: The unknown

ability0.desc: Throw your current block at a target of your choice, replacing that target's block with yours.
ability0.title: Block throw

ability1.desc: Throw all your weight (it's a lot!) into a punch, crushing a random 2x2 square on the board.
ability1.title: Punch

ability2.desc: Execute a full power slash with your beloved sword, cutting a diagonal line on your target's board.
ability2.title: Mighty Slash

ability3.desc: Fiercely stomp on the ground causing blocks with gaps beneath to drop.
ability3.title: Earthquake

warrior.desc: An offensive fighter who attacks the enemy with direct attacks and his powerful muscle power. Harnesses abilities to hurt others and trigger entire earthquakes.
warrior.title: Warrior

user-id-handling.desc:
No match history available? Play a match or login with a exported battletris id.

Battletris wants to be a secure place for you and don't want to get any security information. So no PASSWORD, just a passwordless authentication. If you want to use the same user id on a different pc, please export a battletris user file and import it on the other machine.
user-id-handling.import-invalid: Not a battletris user id file.
user-id-handling.title: User export / import

start-page.multi-player-desc: Join a battle room and play against 4 other players.
start-page.settings-desc: Manage user name, class and view game history.
start-page.single-player-desc: Play a match alone in the browser without any server.
start-page.tutorial-desc: Checkup the game mechanics with an tutorial.

1-battletris.desc: Welcome to BATTLETRIS, a multiplayer block stacking game for up to 5 players. It follows the basic logic of the classic tetris. BATTLETRIS adds much more complexity to the original game. With several classes, leveling, abilities, mana and armor you will be able to actively act against other players. And func fact, it's good for your brain. ;)
1-battletris.title: Whats BATTLETRIS?

2-quick-nav.desc: From the start page and with the back button on the top, you will be navigated back to the mode selection. From this mode selection, you will reach the specific views for SinglePlayer, Multiplayer, Settings or Version overview. With the small icons at the bottom, you can navigate even more faster.
2-quick-nav.title: Quick Navigation

3-rooms.desc: On this page you can see all available rooms and can view a running battle or join a new game.
3-rooms.title: Room Selection

4-joining.desc: To join a game, just use the join button and wait for all others to be ready. Just press the start button and you will be marked as ready. When everyone is ready, the game will start. At this screen you can also change your class and your player name.
4-joining.title: Join Game

5-game.desc:
BATTLETRIS is full packed with classic and new features.

← / →: Move a stone to the left or the right.↑ to turn the stone to the right. You can also use the key A to turn the stone to the left or D to the right. Use the ↓, to move a block downwards. Use the space key
5-game.title: In Game

6-export-import.desc: On the settings screen, you can import and export an BATTLETRIS user file. This file is used for authenticating you against the system, to view your previous game history.
6-export-import.title: Export / Import
